page.title: 17Cannington V.C.School
page.content: Cannington Church of England V.C. Primary School is situated in the centre of the village near the church. About 150 pupils,aged from four to eleven years,attend the school.The children are educated in five classes. The head master,five teachers and eleven non teaching staff are employed at the school. The school has its own kitchen where the midday meal is cooked,a large hall and a library/television room in addition to the offices,staffroom and classrooms.Outside there is a large playing field,gardens and a learner swimming pool. The Domesday Survey was under taken by pupils in the top two classes.The survey work was done by the pupils, edited by the two class teachers and typed into the computer by the children themselves.
